pkgmetadata.longdescription: GnuPG is a complete and free implementation of the OpenPGP standard as defined by RFC4880.

use.flag: Build scdaemon software. Enables usage of OpenPGP cards. For other type of smartcards, try app-crypt/gnupg-pkcs11-scd. Bring in dev-libs/libusb as a dependency; enable scdaemon.
Build direct CCID access for scdaemon; requires dev-libs/libusb.
Enable support for Trust of First use trust model; requires dev-db/sqlite.
